[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Voittoa tai tappiota osoittava laskelma but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 84,600,000 reported in the network role http://uponor.com/roles/Tase should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 175,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://uponor.com/roles/LaskelmaOmanPaeaeomanMuutoksista. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700KA2GMSYJM3CM12/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/Uponor-2020-12-31.zip/Uponor-2020-12-31/reports/Uponor-2020-12-31.xhtml 5967

[DQR.IFRS.0101.9536] The concept ifrs-full:PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares appears in the investing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares is a financing item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from financing activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9536 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Statement of financial position but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:SharePremium, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:OtherReserves, ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation, uponor:ProfitForThePeriod All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 03 - Statement of cash flows includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital of 191,100,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 182,700,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital that should add to 191,100,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 52,700,000 - AdjustmentsForDividendIncome 100,000 + AdjustmentsForIncomeTaxExpense 25,700,000 + AdjustmentsForInterestExpense 3,500,000 - AdjustmentsForInterestIncome 800,000 + AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets 900,000 + AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfAssociates -4,200,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 8,900,000 + ProfitLoss 96,100,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 03 - Statement of cash flows. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital Total Value : 191,100,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700KA2GMSYJM3CM12/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/1/743700KA2GMSYJM3CM12-2020-12-31.zip/Uponor-2020-12-31/reports/Uponor-2020-12-31.xhtml 5973

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 68,800,000 reported in the network role http://uponor.com/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 123,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://uponor.com/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
